gcc   -rdynamic CMakeFiles/main.dir/MPI_basic.c.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/data_placer.c.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/data_to_send.c.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/halo_com.c.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/halo_update.c.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/main.c.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/worksplit.c.o  -o main -Wl,-rpath,/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi.so
